Yeah, nah, players hate that stuff.

It's a really crummy feeling to take a playable character teaser and try to do an artsy story about the new playable from another character's eyes, and then develop that other character better in the story than the playable one. That causes you to have a huge chunk of players stop caring about the playable character and ask if we'll see more of that framing device when it's supposed to be the playable character's biggest time to shine in the history of the game.

But players also love hoping champions like these will become a champion one day, which they might
*cough* Yone *cough*

EDIT: I don't mean Yone specifically might become a champion one day, I have no idea. I mean a story like that might be written with the intention of making it a champion one day C:

You don't want players to be hoping some other character will be made during the exact period of time where hype for the new playable character should be at its maximum. If you want to tease that other character you can tease it when the new character hasn't just been released.
Yone, Rafen, Senna, (Kassadin's Daughter), E/C (That guy from Caitlyns story, forgot the letter) just to name a few
